column2: Fixes path so that local modules get priority

column3: By using sys.path.extend() the local source and content directories are given lower priority than the global python site-path. This can be problematic if the module being developed is also installed in the site-path.
This patch will give priority to the local source and content directories. This way developers can test their modules while developing them.

Hi @allfro! Sorry for a very late response.
It's a default starting command for Python Console and it can be changed in Python Console Settings "Starting Script". I don't think we should change it for all the users.
Thank you very much for your interest!
Fixes path so that local modules get priority
